amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to improve the inspection, mounting, and retention of emergency locator transmitters.

vote.text: Amendment SA 53 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 53 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S831) To require the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to improve the inspection, mounting, and retention of emergency locator transmitters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 53 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 53 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Murkowski.
